name: Dinobeemon
effect: [When Digivolving] If a Digimon card with [Free] in its traits is in this Digimon's digivolution cards, suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 5000 DP or less.
digivolve_effect: [Your Turn] When one of your Digimon with [Imperialdramon] in its name deletes an opponent's Digimon in battle and survives, gain 1 memory.
